name: v3_mysql
description: ``` $ npm init -y $ npm install express $ npm install axios ``` ## git 설정 ``` $ git init $ git add . $ git commit -m "first commit" $ git branch -M v2_axios $ git remote add origin https://github.com/bizzy91/proverload.git $ git push -u origin v2_axios ``` ## 진행 상황 ``` const example_data =  [     {         id: 0,         name: "bizzy0",     },     {         id: 1,         name: "bizzy1",     },     {         id: 2,         name: "bizzy2",     }, ] ``` POST /create ``` let id = req.body.id let name = req.body.name example_data.push({     id: id,     name: name }) console.log(example_data) ``` GET /read ``` console.log(example_data) ```
